original_title: Sagwa, the Chinese Siamese Cat: Cat Tales and Celebrations
overview: This double bill of engrossing fun features the adventurous feline from the mind of celebrated author Amy Tan. Includes the episodes in "Cat Tales" ("How Sagwa Got Her Colors," "Fur Coat" and "Stinky Tofu") and "Feline Festivities" ("New Year's Cleanup," "By the Light of the Moon" and "Ba-Do and the Lantern Festival"). All in all, they're purrfect!
title: Sagwa, the Chinese Siamese Cat: Cat Tales and Celebrations
